articles.title: S&P 500 flirts with record high; chipmakers and small caps jump
articles.description: The S&P 500 closed higher, driven by gains in AI-related chipmakers and tech giants like Alphabet and Amazon. Smaller companies also saw significant gains, with the Russell 2000 outperforming major indices. Positive economic fundamentals and strong earnings, particularly in technology, fueled investor confidence despite concerns over tech valuations.
articles.content:
Synopsis
The S&P 500 closed higher, driven by gains in AI-related chipmakers and tech giants like Alphabet and Amazon. Smaller companies also saw significant gains, with the Russell 2000 outperforming major indices. Positive economic fundamentals and... [4407 chars]

articles.title: Edtech gains as smaller towns turn up big for English lessons
articles.description: While WestBridge-backed SpeakX and Lightspeed-backed Stimuler are among startups focused on English learning, larger test-preparation platforms such as Adda247 and Physics Wallah have expanded into this space. With generative AI addressing the technology layer, multiple apps are getting launched, industry executives said.

While WestBridge-backed SpeakX and Lightspeed-backed Stimuler are among startups focused on English learning, larger test-preparation platforms such as Adda247 and Physics Wallah have expanded into this space. With generative AI addressing t... [5598 chars]

articles.title: Correction: 70+ Companies Including Bajaj Finance, Adani Enterprises Report Earnings Today
articles.description: A comprehensive correction reveals over 70 Indian companies across diverse sectors are reporting quarterly earnings today, including major names like Bajaj Finance, Adani Enterprises, Mankind Pharma, Pidilite Industries, and Varun Beverages, spanning financial services, pharmaceuticals, consumer goods, infrastructure, technology, and manufacturing industries.
articles.content: A comprehensive list of over 70 Indian companies across diverse sectors are scheduled to announce their quarterly earnings results today, providing investors with crucial insights into corporate performance. The extensive roster spans financial servi... [7685 chars]

articles.title: Apple Releases Safari Technology Preview 236 With Bug Fixes and Performance Improvements
articles.description: Apple today released a new update for Safari Technology Preview, the experimental browser that was first introduced in March 2016. Apple designed Safari Technology Preview to allow users to test features that are planned for future release versions of the Safari browser. Safari Technology Preview 236 includes fixes and updates for CSS, Forms, HTML, Images, Media, Rendering, SVG, Web API, and WebRTC.
articles.content: Apple today released a new update for Safari Technology Preview, the experimental browser that was first introduced in March 2016. Apple designed ‌Safari Technology Preview‌ to allow users to test features that are planned for future release versions... [901 chars]

articles.title: Why Play Spaces Matter More Than Ever for Childhood Development
articles.description: Childhood looks different today than it did even a decade ago. Many parents notice it: busier schedules, more digital distractions, and less unstructured outdoor time. While technology brings benefits, it […]
articles.content: Childhood looks different today than it did even a decade ago. Many parents notice it: busier schedules, more digital distractions, and less unstructured outdoor time. While technology brings benefits, it has also changed how children play. As a resu... [5928 chars]

articles.title: America Gets a Lifeline as NASCAR Sends $3M Worth of Help to Struggling Olympic Team
articles.description: NASCAR decided to help the American Olympic team with advanced technology ahead of the upcoming winter Olympics in Italy.
articles.content: Since its inception, the American luge team has often competed against stronger, better-funded European programs. This has made their Olympic success more difficult to achieve. With limited access to advanced tech and financial constraints, the team ... [4133 chars]

articles.title: Musk's Mega Merger: SpaceX and xAI Set Unprecedented Record
articles.description: SpaceX has acquired Elon Musk's AI startup, xAI, in a monumental deal merging space exploration with artificial intelligence. Valued at $1 trillion for SpaceX and $250 billion for xAI, the merger sets a new record in technology sector M&A deals. The merger may face scrutiny over Musk's interconnected ventures.
articles.content: In a groundbreaking move, Elon Musk's SpaceX has acquired his artificial intelligence startup, xAI, setting a new benchmark for mergers and acquisitions in the technology sector. The deal, reported by Reuters, combines Musk's cutting-edge satellite a... [736 chars]

articles.title: Palantir CEO defends surveillance tech as US government contracts boost sales
articles.description: Feb 2 (Reuters) - Palantir Technologies CEO Alex Karp defended the ‌firm's surveillance technology as it reported a big jump in sales on Monday, saying it has safeguards to prevent government ‌overreach, without mentioning U.S. immigration enforcement efforts in Minnesota that have drawn widespread protests.
articles.content: Feb 2 (Reuters) - Palantir Technologies CEO Alex Karp defended the ‌firm's surveillance technology as it reported a big jump in sales on Monday, saying it has safeguards to prevent government ‌overreach, without mentioning U.S. immigration enforcemen... [3547 chars]

articles.title: LG lauds NCC’s contribution in nurturing youth, promoting self-less service
articles.description: Excelsior Correspondent Jammu, Feb 2: “The true meaning of a developed society and a developed nation, extends far beyond infrastructure, modern technology, or economic progress alone. A developed society and nation also signifies a place where people possess strong character, where social values stand firm, and where the social fabric remains bound together in unity,” the Lieutenant Governor Manoj Sinha said on Monday. He said that the nation’s true identity emerges from the thinking, conduct, and mutual trust of its […]
